General.Name: Vinny Overseas Limited
General.Description: Vinny Overseas Limited engages in the manufacturing and processing of textile fabrics in India. The company offers polyester for use in clothing, home furnishings, industrial fabrics, computer and recording tapes, and electrical insulations; rayon; cotton fabrics for use in dresses, kurtis, and shirtings; denims; and PV and PC blended products. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.
